main.about#Subjects: Training in natural and concrete sciences, specialties, IT and foreign languages
main.about#Tutors: A team of professional teachers and mentors with high pedagogical experience and knowledge
main.about#Pupil: Users who aim to further increase their knowledge, experience and potential
main.about#Comment: Opinions of users who achieved their goals using the platform and received positive results
main.mainTitle1: Here you can find qualified tutors in any subject and direction.
main.aboutProject#1: Gettutor is a convenient and modern platform for providers of private tutoring services (teachers) and users of this service.
main.aboutProject#2: As a professional teacher, share your knowledge and experience with others, earn money and get various gifts and bonuses.
main.aboutProject#3: As a student, learn from professional teachers and achieve your goals without different intermediaries, at a time and place convenient for you, based on sorting, using more than 10 parameters.
main.aboutProject#4: Everything is simple. Register on the platform for free and fill out the form. Borders and regions are no longer important for quality education and training.
main.subject: Subjects
main.freeReg#: Register on the platform as a teacher or student
main.verifiedTutors#: Availability of documents confirming expertise and experience
main.learn#: Get/give education in the comfort of your home or training center
main.earn#: Gaining income by providing tutoring services
main.rating#: Based on special criteria, the platform itself forms automatically
main.searchOptions#: Tutor search and sorting system based on more than 10 parameters
main.inviteTutors: Do you want to share your knowledge and experience with others?
main.inviteTutors#: Register on the Gettutor platform and fill out the form. Do not forget that quality and complete filling of the form guarantees confidence in you.
main.question#1: What are the purpose and benefits of the platform?
main.question1: The purpose of the platform is a modern technological platform where private education providers and students meet. It is the best solution for those who offer tutoring services outside of work or study and those who receive reliable, quality education.
main.question2: Registration in the system is done through the user's personal mobile number. After entering the mobile number, a special SMS code will be sent to the user's phone and he will enter it in the appropriate box of the platform. After entering the platform, it is required to fill out the personal questionnaire in full and in good quality. The completeness and quality of the information in the personal questionnaire plays an important role in extracting and recommending the user's information in the search engine of the platform.
main.question#3: Who can provide tutoring services through the platform?
main.question3: Any citizen (resident or non-resident) with teaching experience, opportunity and ability can provide tutoring services by registering on the platform.
main.question#4: Is the platform free or paid?
main.question4: The use of the platform is free for one month after registration, after which the use is continued by receiving one of the tariffs for 1, 3 or 6 months. If the tariff is not extended at the end of the free period or the tariff period, the use of the platform will be temporarily suspended.
main.question#5: I want to do online tutoring. Which services do you recommend using?
main.question5: Today, it is recommended to use Zoom, Skype and Google meet services, which are the most popular and have a convenient interface. It is possible to use these services on a free and paid basis.
main.question6: Active tutors are teachers who have registered on the platform, who have 100% filled out the questionnaire completely and with high quality, who have been using the platform for at least 2 months without a break, who have more than 5 monthly students and electronic learning materials. All this is determined automatically depending on the user's actions on the platform.
main.question#7: I currently live in the US. Can I also register and tutor in this system?
main.question7: Of course. You can register on the platform from anywhere and provide tutoring services based on one of the established tariffs. For this, you must have pedagogical skills, knowledge and experience along with technical ability.
main.question#8: How and on what basis is the rating of teachers formed?
main.question8: The rating score of the teacher is automatically determined based on his activity in using the platform, education, degree, seniority, local and international diplomas and certificates, the number of students on the platform, the availability of a free trial lesson, and the positive conclusions of students. Teachers with a high rating score are also active in the search engine, and information about them appears first in the search.
main.question#9: Which payment systems can I use to pay tariffs?
main.question9: You can pay through Payme, Click and Visa payment systems.
main.question#10: In what cases will the teacher profile have an approval badge?
main.question10: A badge of approval is given to the profile of teachers who are active and highly rated on the platform. Teachers with a badge of approval are trusted and are recommended first for students in search engines.
main.fillForm: Send your question or request through this form and we will contact you!

forRightHolders.body#1: This policy for the processing of personal data and ensuring the confidentiality of personal data (hereinafter referred to as the Policy) is published on the WWW.GETTUTOR.UZ web service on the Internet and its mobile applications, on its official pages on social networks (hereinafter referred to as the Policy). as a Service) applies to all posted data.
forRightHolders.body#2: Using the service means the user's unconditional consent to this policy and the conditions for processing personal data specified in it. If you do not agree with these terms, the user may refuse to use the Service.

privacyPolicy.body#1:
1.1. For the purposes of this policy, the user's personal information means:
1.1.1. Personal information that the user independently provides about himself when registering or using the service, including the user's personal data.
1.1.2. The Administration of the Service, as a rule, does not verify the accuracy of personal data provided by users and does not control their legal capacity. At the same time, the administration of the Service proceeds from the fact that the user provides reliable and sufficient personal information on the issues proposed in the registration form and updates this information. The risk of providing false information remains with the user who provides it.
privacyPolicy.title#2: Purposes of processing personal data of users
privacyPolicy.body#2:
2.1. The Service collects and stores personal data for the following purposes:
2.2.1. Identification of a user registered in the service to use all available services of the service.
2.2.2. Providing the user with access to personalized service resources.
2.2.3. Set up user feedback, including sending notifications, service usage requests, and handling user and application requests.
2.2.4. Improving the quality of service, ease of use, developing new services and services.
privacyPolicy.title#3: What personal information about users is collected?
privacyPolicy.title#4: How is collected personal information used?
privacyPolicy.body#4: 4.1. The personal data provided by the user is used for authorization on the service and exchange of opinions with it, user verification, including sending notifications.
privacyPolicy.title#5: Conditions for processing the user's personal data and transferring it to third parties
privacyPolicy.title#6: Terms of deletion of personal data
privacyPolicy.body#6:
6.1. The user has the right to stop using the Service and delete his profile at any time. For this, it is required to enter the "Settings" section of the user's personal cabinet in the Service and click the "Delete profile" button and confirm it. Also, the user can stop using the service and delete his profile by sending a request to help@gettuttor.uz.
6.2. The administration will delete the user's profile and related personal data within 14 (fourteen) days after receiving his written, justified request.
privacyPolicy.body#7:
7.1. The user is obliged to:
7.1.1. Providing information about personal information required to use the service.
7.1.2. Update, complete, delete provided information about personal data or a part of them, if this data has changed.
7.2. The service administration is obliged to:
7.2.1. Use the information obtained only for the purposes described in this privacy policy.
7.2.2. Ensure that confidential information is kept confidential, not disclosed without the written consent of the user, and also not to sell, exchange, publish or disclose in any other possible way the transmitted personal information of the user, except as provided for in this privacy policy.
7.2.3. Takes precautions to protect the privacy of user personal information in accordance with processes generally used to protect this type of information in existing business operations.
7.2.4. In case of detection of incorrect personal data or illegal actions, blocking of personal data related to the relevant user from the moment the user or his legal representative or the competent body for the protection of the rights of personal data subjects apply or request for a verification period.
privacyPolicy.body#8:
8.1. The service administration has the right to make changes to this privacy policy without the consent of the user.
8.2. The new privacy policy will be effective from the moment it is posted on the site, unless otherwise stated in the new version of the privacy policy.
8.3. All suggestions or questions regarding this privacy policy should be sent to the Service administration at help@gettutor.uz.
8.4. The current privacy policy is posted on the following page: https://gettutor.uz/confidential/n

termsOfUse.title: TERMS OF USE
termsOfUse.body: "GETTUTOR.UZ" web service and its mobile applications
termsOfUse.body2: These terms of use under the trademark "GETTUTOR" have the nature of a public offer (hereinafter - the rules) of the web service "GETTUTOR.UZ" founded by "AnySoft" limited liability company (hereinafter - the Service Provider). and the use of its mobile applications set the terms. These rules were developed based on the Civil Code of the Republic of Uzbekistan, the Law "On Electronic Commerce" and other normative legal documents.
termsOfUse.body#1:
The user is a natural person who is 16 years old, regardless of citizenship, nationality, religion and ethnic origin, who is registered in accordance with the terms of this contract and can use the web service and its mobile applications from anywhere in the world.
A tutor is a teacher who provides private tutoring services at home or remotely. He can conduct individual and group training sessions on various subjects.
Personal cabinet is a user's personal page, where information about him and his activities on the site is stored. For example, purchase history, rates, payments, favorites, personal information and settings.
Verification Badge - This badge shows that the page is authentic and helps other users to distinguish your profile online. Profiles with a badge of approval will receive a blue check mark next to their general name.
A mobile application is a software designed to work on smartphones, tablets and other mobile devices, an electronic resource developed for a specific platform (iOS, Android). Mobile applications can be pre-installed on the device itself or downloaded from the AppStore, Google play and other online application stores for free or for a fee. Mobile applications developed by the service provider are its absolute intangible (intellectual) property.
A subscription is a business model in which a customer pays a recurring amount on a regular basis to access and use products or online services.
Active tutor - registered on the web service, filled out the form 100% completely and qualitatively, used the web service or its mobile applications continuously for at least 2 months, the number of students is more than 5, e-learning are teachers with materials.
termsOfUse.body#2:
2.1. The copyright of the "GETTUTOR.UZ" web service and its mobile applications belongs to the Service Provider.
2.2. To use the web service and its mobile applications, registration is required in accordance with this agreement.
2.3. The use of the web service and its mobile applications is free for tutors for 1 (one) month, and after this period, it will be possible to use it after making a subscription payment according to one of the established tariffs.
2.4. The use of the web service and its mobile applications is absolutely free for students.
2.5. The user has the right to change the tariffs received for continuous use of the Web service and its mobile applications to another tariff or to cancel it at any time.
2.6. Acceptance of this contract (the response of the person to whom the offer was sent that he accepted it) means that the user agrees to all the terms of the current offer.
2.7. The mobile application can be downloaded for free through the "Play market" and "App store" internet stores.
2.8. In order to increase the number of users of the web service and its mobile applications, the service provider provides temporary promo codes with the help of various contests and promotions. Based on these promo codes, users can get 1, 3 and 6 months of free usage. Only one person can use one promo code.
2.9. Disputes arising under these provisions shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of Uzbekistan, regardless of the area of ââuse.
2.10. The Service Provider owns the exclusive right to the "GETTUTOR.UZ" web service and its mobile applications, as well as logos, graphics, designs, layouts, and drawings, which are considered the product of the Service Provider's intellectual activity.
2.11. The Service Provider undertakes to keep confidential from third parties any personal information of users who have registered and subscribed through the web service and its mobile applications in the prescribed manner.
termsOfUse.body#3:
3.1. Regardless of citizenship, nationality, religion and ethnic origin
Persons over the age of 16 may register and subscribe to the Web Service and its mobile applications.
3.2. Registration is carried out voluntarily by the user, through the user's personal mobile (phone) number.
3.3. When a personal mobile (phone) number is entered for registration, a special code will be sent to the user's mobile number via SMS. The service is activated by entering this code in the requested (relevant) place. During registration, user's name, surname and mobile phone number address information must be entered.
3.4. After successful registration, users (tutors and students) are required to fill out their own personal application in good quality and completely. After that, the service gives this user a sign confirming that he has been trusted and verified.
3.5. After successful registration, tutors will receive a reminder to subscribe at any rate when accessing the web service or its mobile applications.
termsOfUse.body#4:
4.1. The duration of the subscription period is divided into tariffs of 1, 3 and 6 months. Subscribed users (tutors) will have the opportunity to use all functions of the web service and its mobile applications during the subscription period.
4.2. Subscription payments are made through electronic money transfer systems.
4.3. Payment:
national currency - soum in electronic form through Payme and Click services;
and foreign currency is made in US dollars through VISA, Master Card international money transfers.
4.4. The subscription price varies depending on the monthly rates and is determined by the service provider. Price changes after subscription are not effective for the current user's subscription period.
4.5. Funds paid for the subscription will not be returned to the user, regardless of whether the services are used or not.
termsOfUse.title#5: 5. Rights and obligations of the user
termsOfUse.title#6: 6. Rights and obligations of the service provider
termsOfUse.body#7:
7.1. This agreement comes into force from the date of acceptance (acceptance) by the user and is valid for an unlimited period.
7.2. Formalizing the cancellation of this contract does not oblige the parties to take separate legal actions.
termsOfUse.body#8:
8.1. If the terms specified in the contract are not fulfilled due to irremediable reasons after the signing of these rules, each of the parties shall be released from the responsibility arising from the full or partial non-fulfillment of the terms.
8.2. Uncontrollable causes mean extraordinary circumstances or situations that a particular party could not have foreseen or prevented through its own means. Such emergency situations include: floods, fires, earthquakes and other natural disasters, war, military operations, activities of bodies in the Republic of Uzbekistan or other countries, as well as any other situations beyond the reasonable control of the parties.
termsOfUse.body#9: 9.1. For non-fulfillment or improper fulfillment of the conditions specified in these rules, the parties may be held liable in accordance with the legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
termsOfUse.body#10:
10.1. Disputes and disagreements related to these rules will be resolved through negotiations between the parties.
10.2. If it is not possible to resolve mutual disputes and misunderstandings through settlement and agreement, the dispute shall be resolved in the civil court in the territory where the legal address of the Service Provider is located, depending on the relevance.
termsOfUse.body#11: 11.1. These rules may be changed unilaterally in whole or in part by the Service Provider at any time. The user will not be warned about this. The amended (or newly revised) text of the Rules shall enter into force from the date of its publication on the portal and mobile application and shall be binding for the user.
